policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:SslAssertion/>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// Only process GET requests"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${request.http.method}"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item dataType="included">
                            <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                        <L7p:item regex="included">
                            <L7p:Pattern stringValue="GET|POST|PUT|DELETE"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// Set up custom eror handling to 401-Unauthorized based on accept type"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="94b7bfcd-e21f-4e94-8a92-f1e8a6599488"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="CRG - Custom Error Response"/>
                    <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="errorContentType"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="errorMessage"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="errorStatus"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Parameters>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="8c8926a0-9e4d-4e65-aa50-b00891d6ca34"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="CRG - Get Client IP Address"/>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// Set warfile name for backend API"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5LmFsbGRhdGEud2FyZmlsZS5BRENvbm5lY3R9"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="contextName"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// Set gateway path for link transformations"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L0FEQUcvcmVwYWly"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="gatewayPath"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:CustomLoggerSuffix stringValue="repair"/>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="Current HTTP concurrency: ${request.listener.concurrency}"/>
                    <L7p:Level stringValue="FINE"/>
                    <L7p:LoggingOnly booleanValue="true"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:CustomLoggerSuffix stringValue="repair"/>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="${request.http.method} processing"/>
                    <L7p:Level stringValue="FINER"/>
                    <L7p:LoggingOnly booleanValue="true"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:CustomLoggerSuffix stringValue="repair"/>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="request uri: ${request.http.uri}"/>
                    <L7p:Level stringValue="FINER"/>
                    <L7p:LoggingOnly booleanValue="true"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:Regex>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// Extract path from request uri"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:AutoTarget booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:CaptureVar stringValue="urlPath"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="request.http.uri"/>
                    <L7p:PatternContainsVariables booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Regex stringValue="${gatewayPath}/(.*)"/>
                    <L7p:RegexName stringValue="parse url"/>
                    <L7p:Replacement stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                </L7p:Regex>
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:CustomLoggerSuffix stringValue="repair"/>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="uri path: ${urlPath[1]}"/>
                    <L7p:Level stringValue="FINER"/>
                    <L7p:LoggingOnly booleanValue="true"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
                            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// Route to ADConnect API"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                </L7p:Properties>
                            </L7p:AssertionComment>
                            <L7p:FailOnErrorStatus booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:OmitAuthHeaderConnectReuseSystemDefault boxedBooleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="https://${gateway.crg.urls.gen3na.api}/${contextName}/${urlPath[1]}${request.url.query}"/>
                            <L7p:ProxyPassword stringValueNull="null"/>
                            <L7p:ProxyUsername stringValueNull="null"/>
                            <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                    <L7p:CustomizeValue stringValue="Bearer ${Access-Token}"/>
                                    <L7p:Name stringValue="Authorization"/>
                                    <L7p:UsesCustomizedValue booleanValue="true"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                    <L7p:Name stringValue="Accept"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                    <L7p:CustomizeValue stringValue="${gateway.alldata.qualified.cluster.hostname}"/>
                                    <L7p:Name stringValue="X-Forwarded-Host"/>
                                    <L7p:UsesCustomizedValue booleanValue="true"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                    <L7p:CustomizeValue stringValue="${request.url.protocol}"/>
                                    <L7p:Name stringValue="X-Forwarded-Proto"/>
                                    <L7p:UsesCustomizedValue booleanValue="true"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                    <L7p:CustomizeValue stringValue="${header.xff}"/>
                                    <L7p:Name stringValue="X-Forwarded-For"/>
                                    <L7p:UsesCustomizedValue booleanValue="true"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                    <L7p:CustomizeValue stringValue="${header.x-real-ip}"/>
                                    <L7p:Name stringValue="X-Real-IP"/>
                                    <L7p:UsesCustomizedValue booleanValue="true"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                    <L7p:CustomizeValue stringValue="${header.x-request-id}"/>
                                    <L7p:Name stringValue="X-Request-ID"/>
                                    <L7p:UsesCustomizedValue booleanValue="true"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                    <L7p:CustomizeValue stringValue="${header.user-agent}"/>
                                    <L7p:Name stringValue="User-Agent"/>
                                    <L7p:UsesCustomizedValue booleanValue="true"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                </L7p:Rules>
                            </L7p:RequestHeaderRules>
                            <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
                            </L7p:RequestParamRules>
                            <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
                                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                                    <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                </L7p:Rules>
                            </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules>
                            <L7p:ResponseSize stringValue="10485760"/>
                        </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// Ensure success status code"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                </L7p:Properties>
                            </L7p:AssertionComment>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${httpRouting.reasonCode}"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item regex="included">
                                    <L7p:Pattern stringValue="200|201|204"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                            <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response.contentType}"/>
                                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="image"/>
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="image"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    </L7p:Predicates>
                                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response.contentType}"/>
                                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="text/xml"/>
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="text/xml"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    </L7p:Predicates>
                                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response.contentType}"/>
                                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="application/xml"/>
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="application/xml"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    </L7p:Predicates>
                                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response.contentType}"/>
                                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="application/json"/>
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="application/json"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    </L7p:Predicates>
                                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                <L7p:assertionComment>
                                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// Check for specific content types to bypass url transformations"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                    </L7p:Properties>
                                </L7p:assertionComment>
                            </wsp:OneOrMore>
                            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                                <L7p:Regex>
                                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// Remove server name from links (if any)"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                    </L7p:Properties>
                                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                                    <L7p:AutoTarget booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:PatternContainsVariables booleanValue="true"/>
                                    <L7p:Regex stringValue="href":"https://${gateway.alldata.qualified.cluster.hostname}/${contextName}"/>
                                    <L7p:RegexName stringValue="transform fully qualified links"/>
                                    <L7p:Replace booleanValue="true"/>
                                    <L7p:ReplaceRepeatCount intValue="99999999"/>
                                    <L7p:Replacement stringValue="href":"https://${gateway.alldata.qualified.cluster.hostname}${gatewayPath}"/>
                                    <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
                                </L7p:Regex>
                                <L7p:Regex>
                                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// change url to match gateway url"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                    </L7p:Properties>
                                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                                    <L7p:AutoTarget booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:PatternContainsVariables booleanValue="true"/>
                                    <L7p:Regex stringValue="(href="|url":"|src="|src=\\"|href=\\")\/${contextName}\/"/>
                                    <L7p:RegexName stringValue="transform links"/>
                                    <L7p:Replace booleanValue="true"/>
                                    <L7p:ReplaceRepeatCount intValue="99999999"/>
                                    <L7p:Replacement stringValue="$1${gatewayPath}/"/>
                                    <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
                                </L7p:Regex>
                                <L7p:assertionComment>
                                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// Appy url transformations"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                    </L7p:Properties>
                                </L7p:assertionComment>
                            </wsp:All>
                            <L7p:assertionComment>
                                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// Apply url transformations if content contains urls"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                </L7p:Properties>
                            </L7p:assertionComment>
                        </wsp:OneOrMore>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// Ensure success status code"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                </L7p:Properties>
                            </L7p:AssertionComment>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${httpRouting.reasonCode}"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item regex="included">
                                    <L7p:Pattern stringValue="301|302"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXNwb25zZS5odHRwLmhlYWRlci5sb2NhdGlvbn0="/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="location"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Regex>
                            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// Remove server name from links (if any)"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                </L7p:Properties>
                            </L7p:AssertionComment>
                            <L7p:AutoTarget booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="location"/>
                            <L7p:PatternContainsVariables booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Regex stringValue="https:\/\/[^\/]+\/${contextName}"/>
                            <L7p:RegexName stringValue="transform fully qualified links"/>
                            <L7p:Replace booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:ReplaceRepeatCount intValue="1"/>
                            <L7p:Replacement stringValue="https://${gateway.alldata.qualified.cluster.hostname}${gatewayPath}"/>
                            <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                        </L7p:Regex>
                        <L7p:AddHeader>
                            <L7p:HeaderName stringValue="Location"/>
                            <L7p:HeaderValue stringValue="${location}"/>
                            <L7p:RemoveExisting booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
                        </L7p:AddHeader>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                    <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// Ensure success status code"/>
                                    </L7p:entry>
                                </L7p:Properties>
                            </L7p:AssertionComment>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${httpRouting.reasonCode}"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item regex="included">
                                    <L7p:Pattern stringValue="300|400|401|404|405|406|409|415|417"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtodHRwUm91dGluZy5yZWFzb25Db2RlfQ=="/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="errorStatus"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXNwb25zZS5tYWlucGFydH0="/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="errorMessage"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="YXBwbGljYXRpb24vanNvbg=="/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="errorContentType"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                            <L7p:CustomLoggerSuffix stringValue="api.errors"/>
                            <L7p:Detail stringValue="time=${request.time} | service=${request.http.uri} | status=${httpRouting.reasonCode} | clientip=${request.tcp.RemoteAddress} | component='ADConnect' | reason='API returned ${httpRouting.reasonCode}' | apiUrl='${httpRouting.url}' | clientTxnId='${clientTxnId}' | user='${username}' | response='${response.mainpart}'"/>
                            <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Level stringValue="WARNING"/>
                            <L7p:LoggingOnly booleanValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="dHJ1ZQ=="/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="stopExecution"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:Encapsulated>
                        <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="// Default error handling and logging for outbound API errors"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:AssertionComment>
                        <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="2f98c882-79db-46de-8f87-e454094d6efd"/>
                        <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="CRG - API Error Handling"/>
                        <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="errorComponent"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="ADConnect"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="errorLog"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Parameters>
                    </L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// Routing and error handling to outbound API"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// GET or POST request processing"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
